alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:52PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Idaho County through 445 PM PDT... At 350 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles northeast of McCall, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Dixie, Warren, Orogrande, Mackay Bar, and Burgdorf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
